programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep710
programme.desc: Pups Save the Big Bad Bird Crew / Pups Save a Soapbox Derby - Myrna the Mynah bird leads her feathered friends astray and it's up to the Paw Patrol to rescue the wayward flock. // Adventure Bay is holding a kids only soapbox derby race when a mysterious newcomer named ''Hum-Kid'' shows up and breaks the rules!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep807
programme.desc: Pups Save The Hiding Elephants - Elephants become trapped in the Monkey Temple after a bee frightens them away from their watering hole.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep111
programme.desc: The Crew & Marshall Build A Fire Station - Rubble & Crew build Builder Cove's first ever Fire Station, complete with an inspection from Paw Patrol's Marshall! But when Speed Meister's sneaky sabotage traps Marshall's Fire Truck, the pups work together to put out a fire construction-style.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep312
programme.desc: Delphine Donkey - Peppa's French friend Delphine Donkey comes to stay. Peppa takes Delphine to daycare for a visit, where they teach her the 'Bing Bong Song', the class' favorite song to sing.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep152
programme.desc: School Play - Peppa and her friends take part in a school play about Little Red Riding Hood, but Pedro Pony is nervous to be on the stage.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Work and Play - When Peppa and Suzy learn that grown ups must work all day, they decide to play at working in a store. But they quickly get tired of it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep302
programme.desc: The Rainbow - Peppa and her family spot a rainbow when they go for a drive.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Friendship Journal - Anna decides to make a scrapbook to celebrate Friendship, where each try to come up with something special enough to deserve the first page in her "friendship journal."

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Hide and Seek - Anna and her friends are outside playing Ron's favorite game, Hide-and-Seek! Anna is the Seeker and quickly finds Froga, Christopher and Bubu. When the friends work together to try to find Ron, they realize he's found the best hiding spot of all.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep405
programme.desc: Firefighter Blue to the Rescue! - Josh and Blue suit up to be firefighter helpers for the day! As we play Blue's Clues to figure out how we can help the firefighters, we train for duty at the fire house, learn about fire safety, and ride Fiery Truck on a special rescue mission!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep711
programme.desc: Pups Save the Skydivers / Pups Save the Cupcakes - Mayor Goodway and Farmer Al are ready for a day filled with Skydiving fun, but their adventure is quickly derailed. It's Paw Patrol to the rescue! // Alex and the Mini Patrol get locked inside the flounder, the Paw Patrol dives in to save the day!

programme.title: Paw Patrol S09 Ep908
programme.desc: Pups Save a Wrongway Farmhand - Traveling Travis volunteers to watch Farmer Yumi and Farmer Al's Farm and characteristically messes up everything.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep112
programme.desc: The Crew Does A Home Renovation / The Crew Builds A Lighthouse - The pups are starstruck when their favorite TV renovation star, Hank Hammer, comes to see them at work. // Cap'n Turbot is bringing Mayor Greatway a big surprise. But when a thick fog rolls in, the pups have to build a lighthouse fast!

programme.title: Deer Squad S03 Ep303
programme.desc: Runaway Hamster Ball / The Perfectinator - Steel accidentally uses the growth ray on Stu and Safia's pet hamster, turning her into a giant stomping hamster! // Steel and Lady Fluffpot get involved in a tidying robot one-up-manship battle when Kai makes Botler the tidiest robot in the city.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep311
programme.desc: Paddington's Puffling Rescue / Paddington Goes Under The Sea - Paddington and the Browns rescue pufflings who, instead of taking their firs flight, get lost around the campsite // Paddington enjoys a diving adventure with Jonatahn and Judy - but where is Judy's necklace?

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Bread - Tiny Chef bakes bread but forgets to watch his rising dough and needs to think fast when the dough grows too big!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Pups Save a School Day / Pups Turn on the Lights - Alex loses his back pack on the first day of school! Ryder and the Paw Patrol need to help him find it. // Its Chases birthday and the pups are planning a surprise party. A storm causes the power to go out!

programme.title: Paw Patrol S09 Ep923
programme.desc: Pups Save Alex's Feathery Friends - The Paw Patrol must rescue Mr. Porter and reunite an ostrich family before the big birds get into big trouble.

programme.title: Dora the Explorer S08 Ep821
programme.desc: Dora Saves Fairytale Land - Dora and Boots journey deep into the Never-to-be-Seen-Again Forest so they can bring magic water back from Sparkling Lake and save the magic in Fairytale Land.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep209
programme.desc: The Finship Trap - When Baby discovers Hank and Goldie aren't speaking to each other, he concocts an elaborate plan to bring them back together.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Shark House Rock / Toothpaste Tumble - Baby Shark helps Mommy find the perfect musical instrument to play in their family band. // Daddy is embarrassed after Grandpa and Baby post a funny video of him on ChewTube.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Toms's Birthday Surprise / Family Treasure Hunt - Santiago, Lorelai and Abuelo traverse treacherous waters to bring Toms a special birthday surprise. // It's a good ol' fashioned family competition as everyone pairs up to find the fabled treasure of La Caverna Secreta.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep103
programme.desc: To The Lighthouse - When a storm blows out the lighthouse light, Santi and crew hurry to guide Mami and Abuelo back from sea.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep303
programme.desc: Pedro's Cough - Pedro gets a contagious cough at daycare and other children soon catch it. When it's time to go the grown-ups catch it too, including Madame Gazelle. Doctor Brown Bear gives them terrible-tasting medicine, but who will look after him when he is sick?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep304
programme.desc: The Library - Daddy Pig has a book from the library that he has kept for too long. The family go to the library to return it and find more books to read.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep305
programme.desc: The Camper Van - Peppa and her family go on vacation in a special van. Peppa is surprised to find that at a push of a button the van converts into a mini-house for them to sleep in!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep306
programme.desc: The Camping Holiday - Peppa and her family are on holiday in their trailer van. They decide to go to Duck Land, a special park where they can see the ducks in the river, and are surprised when they learn that their van can convert into a boat!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep307
programme.desc: Compost - Peppa and George take a bin of vegetable peelings to Grandpa Pig's compost heap. Worms inside the bin turn the peelings into compost, which Granny and Grandpa use to help their plants grow.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep308
programme.desc: Richard Rabbit Comes to Play - Richard Rabbit comes to play with George, and Suzy Sheep comes to play with Peppa! The boys and girls don't want to play the same games, but they all like jumping up and down in muddy puddles.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep106
programme.desc: It's Only a Mystery... / The Battle - Taking after his favourite detective, Barbabravo looks for a case to solve. Can he solve the mystery of the missing ice statue? // Inspired by their favourite heroes, the Barbababies make costumes. But no heroes are possible without villains...

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S06 Ep604
programme.desc: Sir Blaze and the Unicorn - Witness the return of Sir Blaze and Sir AJ as they embark on an epic quest to free a magical unicorn from an unpoppable bubble!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S06 Ep605
programme.desc: Race to Sky High Mountain - At the starting line for Race to Sky High Mountain, one of Crusher's cheats threatens to sideline Blaze for good. To get back in this race, Blaze will need... Power Tires!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep703
programme.desc: Pups Save an Antarctic Martian / Pups Save the Maze Explorers - Travelling Travis is on another great adventure when he lands in Antarctica but believes he's actually on Mars. // Mr. Porter and Alex go on a sightseeing hike but get trapped inside a huge maze! The Paw Patrol has to find the maze and their friends!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep705
programme.desc: Pups Save a Waiter-Bot / Pups Stop a Pie-Clone - Mr. Porter's high tech waiter robot helps around the caf, but it can't stop cleaning! It's up to the Pups to clean up the mess all over town! // Mayor Humdinger creates a cyclone of delicious pies! The Pups must stop it before the town is covered.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Shark House Rock / Toothpaste Tumble - Baby Shark helps Mommy find the perfect musical instrument to play in their family band. // Daddy is embarrassed after Grandpa and Baby post a funny video of him on ChewTube.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Legendary Loot - After finding a map to the Legendary Loot, the Shark family splits up to hunt the treasure down.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep115
programme.desc: The Fuchsia Ocean / Zero Waste - Chemical sprays are making the countryside rosy! The Barbapapas' build an aviary to protect sick birds. // When they see a beach covered with rubbish, the Barbapapa family decides to clean the beach and use the trash to make a miniature golf course.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Paddington's Pirate Treasure Hunt / Paddington's Sandcastle Showstopper - Paddington leads a treasure hunt to find captain Green Beard's loot, but will they all remain friends and share? // Everyone is keen to win the sandcastle competition and enjoy a special icecream prize, but teamwork is key!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep406
programme.desc: Knights of the Snack Table - Sir Joshalot and the Knights of the Snack Table are on an epic quest through the neighborhood to find a special treat for the afternoon snack feast! Throughout their journey, the knights demonstrate the most knightly of qualities-helping others.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep113
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Dinosaur Museum / The Crew Builds a Wheelchair Ramp - After uncovering dinosaur bones, the pups decide to build a dinosaur museum! // When Omar the Mail Carrier breaks his foot, it's up to the pups to make sure he can still deliver the mail by building ramps all over town.

programme.title: Deer Squad S03 Ep304
programme.desc: The Secret Island / Astrobot - Lady Fluffpot visits a secret island with Steel to find a birthday present from her cousin Adventure Alex. // Muffin's plan to get Dinobot into trouble goes disastrously wrong when the pair get trapped with Lola in an out-of-control Space Shuttle.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep115
programme.desc: The Curse of the Gold Falcon / The Island of Lost Things - Santiago and crew set sail to return the Golden Falcon idol back to it's rightful resting place. // When Santiago's magic sword is transported to the Island of Lost Things, the good pirates have to track it down by getting themselves lost!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Call Me Billiam / The Finship Trap - When Rayna asks William to be more responsible, he sets out to become a grownup fishy named Billiam. // When Baby discovers Hank and Goldie aren't speaking to each other, he concocts an elaborate plan to bring them back together.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Ultimate Hype Bear / The Chrysalis Crew / Just Say No - Bissy is meeting her favorite band, but Bossy tags along. // Bossy and Turtle find a chrysalis. // Turtle has trouble telling his friends no.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep710
programme.desc: Pups Save the Big Bad Bird Crew / Pups Save a Soapbox Derby - Myrna the Mynah bird leads her feathered friends astray and it's up to the Paw Patrol to rescue the wayward flock. // Adventure Bay is holding a kids only soapbox derby race when a mysterious newcomer named ''Hum-Kid'' shows up and breaks the rules!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep807
programme.desc: Pups Save The Hiding Elephants - Elephants become trapped in the Monkey Temple after a bee frightens them away from their watering hole.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep312
programme.desc: Delphine Donkey - Peppa's French friend Delphine Donkey comes to stay. Peppa takes Delphine to daycare for a visit, where they teach her the 'Bing Bong Song', the class' favorite song to sing.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep313
programme.desc: Fire Engine - When Mummy Pig helps out at Miss Rabbit's fire station, she is called upon to douse the flames at Daddy Pig's out-of-control barbecue!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep314
programme.desc: Princess Peppa - Granny and Grandpa Pig come for a dinner party with Mummy and Daddy Pig. Peppa and George are too tired to go to bed, until they are told a story.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Fun Run - Daddy Pig finds it hard work when he runs a race to raise money for the school roof, but it's easier to run when a wasp is chasing him!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Washing - Daddy Pig hangs his clean football shirt out to dry, but Peppa, George and Mummy splash it with mud. They put it in the wash, but Peppa puts her red dress in too which turns Daddy's shirt pink!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep311
programme.desc: Polly's Boat Trip - Peppa and George go boating with Grandpa Pig and Polly Parrot, but later Grandpa Pig drops his mobile phone into the water.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Hiccupism / Silence please - Barbabeau can't paint. He has a hiccup he can't get rid of. Just when he's about to give up, he accidentally creates a new artistic movement. // Barbalib wants to compete in a writing contest but his brothers and sisters stop her from concentrating.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep416
programme.desc: Josh and Blue's Ice Cream Shop - Josh and Blue are serving up ice cream on a hot, summer day, but there's just one problem--everyone is gone! Where is everyone? While playing Blue's Clues to figure it out, we help Jingles the ice cream truck and even learn how to make ice cream!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep716
programme.desc: Pups Save the Chalk Art / Pups Save a Hot Potato - The Mini Patrol and the Pups race to the rescue to save a local mural before the rain comes. // Farmer Al and Yumi find out their garden is full of holes and their one of a kind potato is missing. Now the pups must find the potato thief!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep115
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A School / The Crew Builds A Waterway - It's the first day of school in Builder Cove... if Rubble & Crew can finish the building in time! / The pups need a construction solution to save Farmer Zoe's crops and to keep Crunchy the beaver from taking all the water!

programme.title: Deer Squad S03 Ep305
programme.desc: The Crystal Of Strength / Clamity - Injured from training and eager to feel strong again, Rammy gets the squad to go in search of the legendary Crystal of Strength on Sparkle Island. // When Steel takes a pearl from a clam, it chases him through the city to try and get the pearl back.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Paddington's Goo Monster / Paddington's Apple Pip Adventure - Paddington makes Goo but can he keep his promise to not make a mess when thngs get out of control? // Paddington and Simi go on a magical journey into the human body to see if an apple pip grows into a tree if you swallow one.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Popcorn - Tiny Chef hosts movie night for friends and turns his tree stump into a popcorn machine to pop enough for everyone!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Pups Save a Super Pup / Pups Save Ryder's Robot - Rubble is pretending to be a super pup but gets himself in some trouble. Ryder and the Paw Patrol have to save Rubble! // When Ryders Robot Pup breaks and starts going wild around Adventure Bay, it takes the whole Paw Patrol to help Ryder find it.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Pups on Ice / Pups and the Snow Monster - Ryder and the PAW Patrol need to rescue Alex on Jakes mountain. // The pups find strange footprints in the snow on the mountain outside Adventure Bay. Everyone thinks its a snow monster and its scaring the skiers away.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Ultra Shell and Wonder Bear / You Ain't Seen Nothing Yeti / Powerless - Bossy helps Turtle's Biggest Dream Come True: being a superhero! // Bossy and Turtle go camping and learn the story of the magical Yeti. // With the power out, Bossy's family must find a way to keep themselves entertained.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep211
programme.desc: Splish Spashketball / The Slug Hank Redemption - Baby, Vola, and William head to Hydrospace to take on Shadow's team in the Splashketball Finals. // Detective Baby Shark and William Watson team up with Hank to help the Slobber Slug out of a jam.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Picture Imperfect / The Fishy Friends Talent Show - Baby accidentally gets messy on family picture day, and goes to extraordinary lengths to get clean before his parents find out. // Penny and Wallace team up to perform in a two-fishy talent show.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Triton's Trumpet / The Curse of the Pirate Baby - Santiago and crew must retrieve a powerful undersea artifact after it's stolen by Enrique. // Bonnie Bones transforms into a baby and it's up to the good pirates to change her back.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep103
programme.desc: The Golden Giant - When Enrique awakens a giant, Santi and crew must find a way to save the day.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep318
programme.desc: Rongisit - Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her friends on a train ride, where they must tick off what they see on their activity sheets. Meanwhile Pedro keeps losing his ticket.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep320
programme.desc: Talent Day - It is Talent Day at Peppa's daycare. Madame Gazelle wants everyone to show the class their special talent.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep321
programme.desc: Trip to the Moon - Peppa's family go to the museum's moon exhibition with George's friend Edmond Elephant. But Peppa thinks there are going to the real moon and is worried.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep126
programme.desc: Snow - It is snowing, so Peppa and George go outside to play.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep323
programme.desc: Goldie the Fish - Goldie the fish does not look happy and is not eating her food, so Peppa, George and Mummy Pig take her on a bus trip to visit Dr Hamster the vet.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep324
programme.desc: Fun Fair - The family go to the funfair, but Mummy Pig is angry when people at the fair tell her that she will not be able to win prizes in the competitions, just like George is sad because the mini golf course is too big for him.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Where Did It Go Barbabravo? / The Big Bad Hen - Like a secret agent, Barbabravo leads the investigation equipped with his gadgets to find out who stole Barbapapa's cake. // Barbalala is convinced she heard a giant hen prowling around the house. The Barbababies organize themselves to stand guard.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Monster Machine Christmas - Its Christmas Eve, and Blaze and AJ are helping Santa and his elves load his magic bag full of presents. But Crusher, who wants to open his present early, tries to sneak into the bag and knocks it over, sending all the worlds presents flying away!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S05 Ep514
programme.desc: Blazing Amazing Stories - Blaze and AJ are babysitting for Baby Gherkin! When it's time for her nap, they tell her three epic bedtime stories about police, cowboys, and superheroes - all starring Blaze and his friends!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Pups and the Big Freeze / Pups Save a Basketball Game - A winter ice storm causes trouble all over Adventure Bay. The PAW Patrol races to the rescue! // Mayor Goodway challenges Mayor Humdingers Basketball team to a game. The pups pitch in and become the Adventure Bay All-Stars!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep714
programme.desc: Pups Save a Rocket Roller Skater / Pups Save Ryder's Surprise - A mix-up delivery leads to Ms. Marjorie and Danny speeding out of control in Adventure Bay. Now the Pups must rescue them. // Ryder's present ends up in the jungle and Carlos is trapped in a Jungle Gym. It's up to the Pups to save them.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Picture Imperfect / The Fishy Friends Talent Show - Baby accidentally gets messy on family picture day, and goes to extraordinary lengths to get clean before his parents find out. // Penny and Wallace team up to perform in a two-fishy talent show.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Yup Day - Baby convinces Daddy to say 'yup' to everything for a day. What's the worst that could happen?

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Clock and Dance / Barbapileup - The barbababies prepare a show for Barbamama's birthday. While Barbalala finishes up, they go to the carnival where Barbabeau gets stuck in an attraction. // Three separate stories telescope into a big final bouquet in the middle of the courtyard.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep312
programme.desc: Paddington's Beach Clean-Up / Paddington's Holiday Farewell - The beach is a mess, but will all the litter be cleared in time for the beach party that everyone has been looking forward to? // The summer holidays have come to an end, so it's time to say goodbye to their new friends.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep416
programme.desc: Josh and Blue's Ice Cream Shop - Josh and Blue are serving up ice cream on a hot, summer day, but there's just one problem--everyone is gone! Where is everyone? While playing Blue's Clues to figure it out, we help Jingles the ice cream truck and even learn how to make ice cream!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep105
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Car Wash / The Crew Plans Grandpa Day - Mayor Greatway needs her muddy motorcycle cleaned fast! Wheeler and the pups jump into action to build a solution before the big race. // It's Grandpa Gravel's special day! But when the pups are needed, they have to change their Grandpa Day plans.

programme.title: Deer Squad S03 Ep306
programme.desc: Baby Steel / Joke's On You - When Steel accidentally turns himself into a baby, he wreaks havoc on Platinum City. // It's the annual "Day of Fun"! However when Ricardo and Trickalien play the ultimate prank on the Deer Squad, the day of fun soon turns into a day of chaos!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Santiago and Bonnie to the Rescue / The Compass Caper - After getting stranded at the bottom of a crevice, Bonnie and Santiago must team up to save the day. // Santiago is on a mad dash to get his compass back after it's nabbed by Bonnie Bones and Sir Butterscotch.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep211
programme.desc: Splish Spashketball / The Slug Hank Redemption - Baby, Vola, and William head to Hydrospace to take on Shadow's team in the Splashketball Finals. // Detective Baby Shark and William Watson team up with Hank to help the Slobber Slug out of a jam.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Lil' Kimchi King and Kween / Don't Go Miss Elky / Doctor Chipper - Turtle wants to win a contest but he's up against Honey Bear. // When Bossy thinks Miss Elky is planning to leave forever, he tries to convince her to stay. // Bossy Turtle and Roller helps Chipper face her fear of going to the doctor's.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep223
programme.desc: Pups Save a Snowboard Competition / Pups Save a Chicken of the Sea - Jake and Everest are excited for the Snowboard Competition, until they see the course is buried under a blanket of snow. // When the PAW Patrol sets out to retrieve Cap'n Turbot's sunken diving bell, they meet a giant Sea Slug!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep807
programme.desc: Pups Save a Yodeler - When Wingnut runs away from wolves that are attracted to his yodeling, he ends up trapped in a canyon. The Paw Patrol has to hurry to save him.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep114
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Splash Park / The Crew Builds A Playroom - With their splash park plans in troubled waters, the pups have to get creative to cool down the town for the summer. // As the pups work on building a surprise playroom for Lucas and Lily, a squirrelly visitor causes construction complications.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep412
programme.desc: Santa's Grotto - Peppa and George and their friends go to see Father Christmas. Peppa asks for a very special doll as a present, but will Father Christmas be able to deliver it to her?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep315
programme.desc: Teddy's Playgroup - Peppa brings home a teddy from daycare to look after, but she is worried that he will not have a very exciting time.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep316
programme.desc: Danny's Pirate Party - It is Danny Dog's birthday, and with the help of Granddad Dog and Grandpa Pig the children take part in a pirate treasure hunt.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep317
programme.desc: Mr Potato Comes to Town - All the people in Peppa's town are excited to meet Mr Potato when he comes to open a new sports center.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep117
programme.desc: A Very Busy Afternoon - Froga organises a gathering to share jam sandwiches with everyone, Ron and Christopher want to show off their acrobatic frisbee skills, Bubu invents a new game he wants to teach his friends - all at the same time!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep118
programme.desc: The Four-Leaf Clover - Anna and her friends have organized a hula hoop competition and Froga relies on her four-leaf clover to help her win! But when she loses it, Froga is convinced there is no way she'll ever win.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep416
programme.desc: Josh and Blue's Ice Cream Shop - Josh and Blue are serving up ice cream on a hot, summer day, but there's just one problem--everyone is gone! Where is everyone? While playing Blue's Clues to figure it out, we help Jingles the ice cream truck and even learn how to make ice cream!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep716
programme.desc: Pups Save the Chalk Art / Pups Save a Hot Potato - The Mini Patrol and the Pups race to the rescue to save a local mural before the rain comes. // Farmer Al and Yumi find out their garden is full of holes and their one of a kind potato is missing. Now the pups must find the potato thief!

programme.title: Paw Patrol S09 Ep912
programme.desc: Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch - When Eddie and Emmy get impatient at the carnival, they hide in Mayor Humdinger's Humsquatch costume to chase everyone out.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep5
programme.desc: The Footprint Badge - The squirrels are playing hide-and-seek, but they can't find Happy. The squirrels follow lots of different footprints that take them to their friend but there is one set they can't work out.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep6
programme.desc: The Fossil Badge - The squirrels are digging in the garden when they come across a fossil, so Duggee and Narrator explain all about fossils and prehistoric times.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep7
programme.desc: The Treehouse Badge - Duggee is cleaning the clubhouse so the squirrels take refuge in the treehouse, but it's getting a little bit cramped these days. Norrie has an idea - maybe they need to add an extension.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep8
programme.desc: Solar Race: Australia - Glitch's hopes of winning a solar-powered race across the Australian outback are foiled when he crashes the Glitchster in the middle of the night.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep9
programme.desc: Go Jetter Heroes: Amelia Earhart - Inspired by her hero Amelia Earhart, Xuli attempts a solo flight across the Atlantic Ocean in a vintage plane.

programme.title: Kit and Pup S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Long and Short - Kit and Pup are cycling. Can you see who is riding the long bike and who is riding the short bike? Kit and Pup are also helping the little investigators measure their footprints.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Ball - Dee encourages a friend to say ball and we go on a whirlwind word adventure.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep96
programme.desc: Take Off - Po collects lots of balloons and takes off into the air! Floating high above Teletubbyland, Po waves at Tinky Winky, Dipsy and LaaLaa below. When the balloons pop, Po lands.

programme.title: Teletubbies Ready Steady Go! S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Silly Things - Join the dance party with the Teletubbies! Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po dance and sing about silly things that make them smile.

programme.title: Clangers S3 Ep23
programme.desc: Top Hat - Tiny has carelessly flipped her cotton ball into the top hat. But when she looks for it, she ends up in a top hat world and is taken to places she never knew existed.

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Downhill Racers - It's the annual go-kart race, and Zip has chosen the racecourse, but is worried it isn't as fun as the ones before, so he tries to make the racecourse more exciting.

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep76
programme.desc: Orange Is The New Snack - Mo's pet hamster is looking forward to a snack... but Doug-Po has eaten all the carrots!

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Messy-power - Hey, who turned out the lights? Messy goes to OKIDO and finds out electricity can lead to music, lights and disco dancing!

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Planet Wobble - Messy and friends rocket into space, but a mischievous Messy sends OKIDO's seasons into chaos! Time to fix this planet wobble.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Monsters - When Jimmy Jones is too scared of monsters to go under the bed to fetch a ball, Monty tells him that there's nothing to worry about and wonders, even if monsters really did live under the bed, how they could be sure they would even be scary.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S3 Ep22
programme.desc: It's Time for a Canal Walk - JoJo and Gran Gran are enjoying a canal walk when they meet Ned and Monty, who need some help - Ned has lost the lock key, causing a canal traffic jam. It's time for a Gran Gran plan.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran Special S1 Ep1
programme.desc: It's Time To Go On A Voyage - JoJo and Gran Gran go to an exhibition to learn about Gran Gran's journey to England. Gran Gran thinks she only has her coat from that time but realises she has more mementos too!

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep39
programme.desc: Snowball Skate - Sarah and Duck explore a Winter Fair in the park, and discover an amazing skating rink inside a giant snowball!

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep40
programme.desc: Ribbon Alvida - An excited Sarah & Duck take the Shallots to see the Ribbon Sisters perform with their family circus.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S16 Ep20
programme.desc: Happy Birthday Sir - On the Fat Controller's birthday, Thomas pulls into Brendam Docks where he meets Salty and Edward. Then the Fat Controller arrives in Winston, the new track inspection vehicle. The Fat Controller tells Thomas that, to celebrate his birthday, he is going shopping with his family.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S16 Ep1
programme.desc: Race To The Rescue - Flynn The Fire Engine is able to run on the roads again, but he is nervous because his wheels wobble.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep30
programme.desc: Fairies - Bluey's house has fairies! Tails are being braided, stickers are everywhere, and Mum's got a peg beard. Now the family must band together to hunt for these invisible mischief-makers.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep24
programme.desc: Trouble Bubbles - Supertato and Evil Pea get stuck inside a giant bubble together. They float through the air until Supertato and Evil Pea pop the bubble by driving it into a supermarket sign.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep8
programme.desc: The Kite Badge - It's a very windy day and the squirrels want to play outside. What can they do? Duggee knows - he's flying his kite. The Squirrels set about making their own kites to fly.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep9
programme.desc: The Tadpole Badge - Duggee has made a beautiful rock pool. The Squirrels spot the strangest things - dots with tails, wriggling around. What on earth are they? They are baby frogs - tadpoles!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep10
programme.desc: The Honey Badge - Duggee's made some delicious pancakes, but the clubhouse is out of honey. Time for the bees to get busy!

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep10
programme.desc: Tulip Fields, Netherlands - Is Glitch stealing tulips from the Netherlands? That's what the Go Jetters think and they almost ruin the parade Glitch and Tala are making a huge tulip flower float for.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep11
programme.desc: Himalayan Heroes, Nepal - Hoping to follow in his great-aunt's footsteps, Glitch enlists the help of a sceptical Foz and a friendly yak in order to find a yeti in the Himalayas.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep12
programme.desc: Monkey Bay, Thailand - Glitch's plans to open a hotel on an unspoilt beach in Thailand go horribly wrong when a group of macaque monkeys steal his Grim-o-freeze gun.

programme.title: Ranger Hamza's Eco Quest S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Tides - Ranger Hamza and the Ramblers discover how the tide plays such an important role in the environment.

programme.title: Andy's Aquatic Adventures S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Andy and the Hawksbill Turtles - Andy's heads to the island of Barbados to help rescue some baby Hawksbill turtles.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S8 Ep6
programme.desc: Sandy's Waistcoat of Wonders - Sandy claims he can pull absolutely anything from of his waistcoat of wonders, so Captain Captain and Seaweed put him to the test. But Sandy decides there's only one way to properly convince them!

programme.title: Swashbuckle S8 Ep7
programme.desc: Seaweed's Dream Spade - Captain Captain reminds Sandy and Seaweed that it is kit check day, but its seems that Seaweed is missing an essential piece of pirate kit!

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep32
programme.desc: Circus - Bluey is the ringmaster in a game of circus with her friends, but Hercules wants to play his motorcycle game instead. Luckily, Bluey has a solution to keep everyone happy.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep33
programme.desc: Swim School - Mum, Dad, and Bingo must complete both their classes to pass swim school, but pleasing strict Big Fish instructor Margaret (aka Bluey) is proving to be very difficult.

programme.desc: Wonder Pea - Supertato is delighted when Evil Pea becomes his sidekick but it's all a trick and Evil Pea captures him! Evil Pea is forced to do a good deed because one of the Cobs needs help.

programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - A look back at some of our favourite stories and interviews from China Tonight in 2023, as we explore the complexity, history, culture and people who make China a superpower.

programme.title: Dolphins: Is Our Love Too Deep?
programme.desc: A ground-breaking investigative documentary that explores the impact humans are having on wild dolphins through hand feeding tourism programs at Monkey Mia and Bunbury in WA, and Moreton Bay and Tin Can Bay in Queensland.

programme.title: Bradman And Tendulkar
programme.desc: Two of cricket's greatest players, sporting icons from different corners of the world. This documentary compares their early lives, stellar careers and dreams, uncovering striking similarities and never-before-shared details.

programme.title: ABC News With Auslan Ep46
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - The latest news and information from ABC News. This bulletin will be Auslan interpreted to provide accessible information to keep Australia's deaf community connected and informed. Presented by Miriam Corowa.

programme.title: Outback Musical
programme.desc: Outback students scattered across sheep and cattle properties overcome distance, drought and disability to put on a show from home as they realise their dreams, dancing, bull-riding and lawn bowling towards the big night.

programme.title: Planet America: Fireside Chat Ep19
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - The race to the 2024 Presidential Election is on. Republican candidates take on frontrunner Donald Trump, while Joe Biden is running for re-election. Chas and John guide you along the way. (Final for 2023)

programme.title: ABC National News Ep101
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's top stories. We have reporters on the ground following the story and the issues that matter.

programme.title: Built To Survive - Savannah Survivors Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Phil Breslin visits the savannah for an encounter with Australia's largest predatory bird, a wedge-tailed Eagle, one of the world's most venomous snakes - the coastal taipan and a real-life dragon - the frill-necked lizard.

programme.title: Decoding Danger - Floods Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Australia is shaped by great storms, extreme heat, and an epic cycle of boom and bust. Life on the island continent has evolved accordingly, to survive drought and flooding rains. How can we learn to survive and thrive?

programme.title: The Dark Emu Story
programme.desc: A thought-provoking and inspiring documentary that charts the impact of Bruce Pascoe's Dark Emu - the publishing phenomenon that challenged Australia to rethink its history and ignited a debate that continues to rage.

programme.title: Project Wild - Tonga Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Nature nerd, Dr Ann Jones travels through the Indo-Pacific region to find the dedicated people bringing our planet's amazing animals, plants and ecosystems back from the brink. This time Ann explores the Kingdom of Tonga.

programme.title: Art Works - Lindy Lee, Halo Vocal Ensemble Ep23
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - This week we find inspiration with Lindy Lee; meet Halo Vocal Ensemble and art influenced by dogs; Namila chats with Jordy van den Nieuwendijk; and the latest in our Instrumental Series with Koto master Satsuki Odamura.

programme.title: Australian Story - A Matter of Minutes (Update) - Mick O'Dowd Ep7
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Mick O'Dowd has survived the unimaginable. He came close to death but lived. Three years after first telling his story, Mick is reclaiming his life and is back doing the things he loves.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep101
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show - Year In Review Special Ep48

programme.title: What Broke The Rental Market?
programme.desc: As the cost of living goes up, nothing looms larger in our budgets than the roof over our heads. Casey Briggs looks at what an average wage gets you in some of the world's big cities, and lessons for our rental crisis.

programme.desc: By Train Through Vietnam - A journey of about 1,700 kilometers. In Vietnam, the "Reunification Express" train travels from Hanoi to Ho Chi Minh City. programme.title: LIVE: UFC 296: Edwards vs. Covington
programme.desc: Main Event - UFC returns to T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas this weekend with the final blockbuster of the year! UFC welterweight champion Leon Edwards steps into the Octagon with former interim titleholder and current No. 3 contender Colby Covington in the main event. UFC flyweight champion Alexandre Pantoja defends his title for the first time against No. 4 Brandon Royval in the co-main event.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep903VolkanovskivsOrtega
programme.desc: Undefeated in the UFC and reigning featherweight champion, Alexander Volkanovski defends his title against Jiu-Jitsu savant, Brian T-City Ortega at UFC 266. See both men train and prepare to fight for the UFCs 145-pound title.

programme.title: Jom Masak Musim Pertama Ep9
programme.desc: Pemain-pemain bola sepak tempatan menunjukkan kemahiran memasak mereka dan berkongsi pengalaman serta aksi memasak yang pasti mencuit hati. Rancangan ini dapat memberi Inspirasi kepada peminat yang menonton

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep10
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback Ep902EFN041PoiriervsHoo
programme.desc: An enhanced replay of the sports biggest fights, featuring never-before-seen footage from specialty cams.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Dynamite Ep2340
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a two-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: 2023 Monster Energy British Grand Prix Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - With more than 60 years of history Silverstone has become one of the most prestigious venues dedicated to motorsport. Completely revamped in recent years, a multimillion pound investment saw the completion in 2010 of a first phase of works to greatly improve the venue, making it one of the fastest tracks on the MotoGP calendar and earning high praise from the World Championship riders who enjoyed the new layout. The Silverstone Wing, a state-of-the-art, multi-million pound complex, became a new landmark at the circuit from 2011, thus adding to already breathtaking facilities at Silverstone

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Rampage Ep2339
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a one-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Dariush vs. Tsarukyan
programme.desc: Prelims - UFC touches down in Austin, Texas this weekend with a pair of thrilling lightweight contenders matches at the Moody Center. In a main event battle of finishers, #4 Beneil Dariush faces off against #8 Arman Tsarukyan. In the co-main event collision, #12 Jalin Turner goes head-to-head with #13 Bobby Green.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Dariush vs. Tsarukyan
programme.desc: Main Event - UFC touches down in Austin, Texas this weekend with a pair of thrilling lightweight contenders matches at the Moody Center.
